title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction, Review of basic concepts in chemistry, chemical thermodynamics, concept of chemical equilibrium, Equilibrium constants and activity, reaction kinetics, acid and basis, polyprotic acids and bases, acidity, alkalinity, carbonate system, pH-CT, buffers, solubility reactions, electrochemistry and electrochemical cells, nuclear chemistry, nitrogen chemistry and chlorination. Introduction, the bacteria, the fungi, the algae, protozoa and other higher forms, viruses, pathogens and disease, microbial growth and enumeration, environmental influences, control of microorganisms.
